    • Uses of ClientInterface in catalog

      Classes in catalog that implement ClientInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddToCatalogGUI
      provides a GUI to handle the process of adding a product to a store's catalog
      class  CatalogGUI
      Provides a GUI that shows a store catalog items
      class  EditCatalogItemGUI
      Provides a GUI that enable editing a catalog's store
      class  ManageCatalogGUI
      Provides a GUI to manage a store's catalog, network products and base catalog

    • Uses of ClientInterface in customer

      Classes in customer that implement ClientInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Provides a GUI that shows the action the customer can do

      A GUI for store manager to create new customer in his/her store.

    • Uses of ClientInterface in networkGUI

      Classes in networkGUI that implement ClientInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CustomerServiceExpertGUI
      Provides a GUI to handle customer service expert actions : Analyzing the surveys results
      class  CustomerServiceGUI
      Provides a GUI to handle customer service actions: (input survey analysis)
      class  CustomerServiceWorkerGUI
      Provides a GUI to handle customer service worker actions: adding new complaint, managing complaints
      class  NetworkManagerGUI
      Provides a GUI to handle network manager actions: views\compares different reports
      class  NetworkWorkerGUI
      Provides a GUI to handle network worker GUI (handle base catalog and products)
      class  StoreManagerGUI
      Provides a GUI to handle Store Manager actions: view report, create new customer
      class  StoreWorkerGUI
      Provides a GUI to handle store worker actions : input surveys' results, manage catalog
      class  SystemManagerGUI
      Provides a GUI to handle System Manager actions : remove user, update user's (and customer's) info

    • Uses of ClientInterface in order

      Classes in order that implement ClientInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CancelOrderGUI
      Provides a GUI that shows all the user orders and allows to cancel them
      class  ComplaintCreationGUI
      this class holds all the GUI related info so we could start the complaint creation process
      class  ComplaintManageGUI
      Provides a GUI to handle complaint management
      class  createOrderBySearchGUI
      Provides a GUI to create an order by search(without the catalog)
      class  CreateOrderGUI
      Provides a GUI that allow the customer to finalize his order
      class  CustomItemGUI
      Provides a GUI allows the customer to order custom Item
      class  HandleComplaintGUI
      a class that holds all the needed functions for the handle Complaint GUI, which takes care of a selected complaint
      class  NewComplaintCreationGUI
      Provides a gui to enable the creation of a new complaint
      class  SelectOrderForComplaintGUI
      In this GUI we select an order of a specific user, to complain about

    • Uses of ClientInterface in survey

      Classes in survey that implement ClientInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddSurveyAnalysisToExistingSurveyGUI
      this class holds the GUI functionality that lets the customer service add an analysis to a specific survey result
      class  ResultInputGUI
      this class lets us add new customer satisfaction survey results to the data base you can only add a result if all fields have been filled.
      class  SurveyAnalysisGUI
      A class that lets the customer service expert browse through the survey's results which haven't been assigned an analysis yet and showing how many we've got
      class  SurveyExplorerGUI
      this class allows us to browse between existing surveys.
